lines.content: * A subclass of Task that can be stored inside the tasklist
* The Duke class acts as a text bot that records down the tasks given to it. It can
* then mark these tasks as completed and delete them based on the inputs given.
* Checks the date input from the user to see if it is a valid date
* @param dateStr Date taken in to check for validity
System.out.println("Invalid date format. Please enter in the format: yyyy-mm-dd");
System.out.println("Hello! I'm Duke\nWhat can I do for you?");

* A subclass of Task that can be stored inside the tasklist
* Acts as the interface for users to input their commands into Duke
* Checks Task class and its subclasses, and checks Tasklist to see if they function
* Tests if the tasks can be initialized
* Tests if methods called in the tasklist can function
assertEquals("[T][X] buy dinner [T][ ] eat dinner [T][ ] go to sleep ", tasks.toString());
